page.title: 09Jobs.
page.content: The area now called Morecambe once comprised 3 villages Bare, Torrisholme and Poulton. The only industries were fishing and farming. Morecambe is now a {holiday resort}and most employment in the town is directly or indirectly reliant on tourism.There are hundreds of hotels, large and small holiday flats cafes and many other businesmen defendant on the holiday trade.Since the 1950s, however there has been a gradual decline in the holiday trade and many hotels and holiday flats open out of season to provide accomotation for lancaster university students and construction workers from the nearby Heysham Nuclear Power station and Gas Field terminus both being built at Heysham. It was hoped that these 2 projects would provide jobs for local labour.
